dct_title_s: Map of the Conotton Creek Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Conotton Creek Basin
dct_description_sm: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
Scale bar lower right corner of map.
"Prepared by JAMES J. SCHMIDT, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Conotton Creek Basin and quality of underground water.
